Option.Name: life duration ended or hit ground/enemy
follow owner at origin or dmyPoly (bottom of character)
rapidly approach and stop at dist & ignores velocity & ignores lockShootLimitAng
random locations around origin (used by firestorm)
slightly higher elevation (used by white dragon breath and other ground crawling bullets)
nearest enemy origin within a certain distance (unused)
random locations around nearest enemy within certain distance (used by bed of chaos)

atkId_Bullet.Wiki: ID of AtkParam_Npc or AtkParam_Pc to use on hit targets.

sfxId_Bullet.Wiki: Visual/audio effect while bullet is active. Refers to ID of an SFX

sfxId_Hit.Wiki: Visual/audio effect when the bullet expires or hits something. Refers to ID of an SFX

sfxId_Flick.Wiki: Visual/audio effect when the bullet is blocked by a shield? (needs verification) Refers to ID of an SFX

dist.Wiki: Arbitrary range threshold (in $quot;meters$quot;) used for swapping between inRange and outRange fields.\nHas misc effects too1.

shootInterval.Wiki: Frequency (in seconds) to generate additional bullets while TAE bullet behavior event remains active.\n0 = do not generate additional bullets

gravityInRange.Wiki: Converts projectile direction downwards/upwards (+/-) by this amount over time while distance is less than the dist threshold.\nAlso increases velocity, but whether this is constant or direction dependent is unknown.

gravityOutRange.Wiki: Converts projectile direction downwards/upwards (+/-) by this amount over time while distance is greater than the dist threshold.\nAlso increases velocity, but whether this is constant or direction dependent is unknown.

hormingStopRange.Wiki: Stops homing when bullet is within this distance (in "meters") of homing target.

accelInRange.Wiki: Movement acceleration/deceleration (+/-) while distance is less than the dist threshold.

accelOutRange.Wiki: Movement acceleration/deceleration (+/-) while distance is greater than the dist threshold.

accelTime.Wiki: Delay (in seconds) before acceleration/deceleration will be applied. Timer only runs once.

homingBeginDist.Wiki: Distance required from the bullet's origin to start homing.

hitRadiusMax.Wiki: Ultimate hitbox radius of bullet (in "meters") when spreadTime timer finishes

spreadTime.Wiki: Time (in seconds) it will take the hitbox size to fully change from hitRadius to hitRadiusMax.\nIf 0, only hitRadius will be used

hormingOffsetRange.Wiki: Distance (in "meters") to offset homing target using the direction they are currently moving.

dmgHitRecordLifeTime.Wiki: Frequency (in seconds) that (penetrating) bullets can apply damage or special effects. 0 = apply once

externalForce.Wiki: Something to do with checking map data to influence bullet direction (like wind). (rarely used, needs verification)

spEffectIDForShooter.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to the bullet's owner.

autoSearchNPCThinkID.Wiki: Used for some homing soul mass/pursuers spell behavior, such as additional projectiles as intelligence increases and launching when applicable.

HitBulletID.Wiki: ID of another bullet to generate once this one expires, or conditionally using launchConditionType.

spEffectId0.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to hit targets.

spEffectId1.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to hit targets.

spEffectId2.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to hit targets.

spEffectId3.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to hit targets.

spEffectId4.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to hit targets.

numShoot.Wiki: Amount of projectiles to generate per interval

homingAngle.Wiki: How quickly the projectile can turn to face a homing target (in degrees per second).

shootAngle.Wiki: Yaw (left/right) angle offset for all projectiles.

shootAngleInterval.Wiki: Yaw (left/right) angle offset between multiple projectiles. See numShoot.

shootAngleXInterval.Wiki: Pitch (up/down) angle offset between multiple projectiles.\nPositive values angle upwards, negative values angle downwards. See numShoot.

damageDamp.Wiki: Reduction in physical damage over time (needs testing. may only apply after dist threshold)

spelDamageDamp.Wiki: Reduction in magic damage over time (needs testing. may only apply after dist threshold)

fireDamageDamp.Wiki: Reduction in fire damage over time (needs testing. may only apply after dist threshold)

thunderDamageDamp.Wiki: Reduction in lightning damage over time (needs testing. may only apply after dist threshold)

staminaDamp.Wiki: Reduction in stamina damage over time (needs testing. may only apply after dist threshold)

knockbackDamp.Wiki: Reduction in knockback over time (needs testing. may only apply after dist threshold)

shootAngleXZ.Wiki: Pitch (up/down) angle offset for all projectiles. Positive values angle upwards, negative values angle downwards.

lockShootLimitAng.Wiki: Maximum angle the bullet's initial direction can change to face towards player locked-on target or AI focused enemy

isPenetrate.Wiki: Determines if bullet can pierce through enemies and objects.\nAlso potentially allows hitting the same enemy multiple times using dmgHitRecordLifetime.\nSee isPenetrateMap to ignore map.

spAttribute.Wiki: Changes visual/audio effects on hit and death animations.

FollowType.Wiki: Misc effects on how bullets behave.

EmittePosType.Wiki: Affects bullet generation locations (needs info and verification)

isAttackSFX.Wiki: Determines if bullets that hit targets will be stuck in them. Used by arrows and throwing knives.

isPenetrateMap.Wiki: Determines if bullets ignore map collision.

isHitBothTeam.Wiki: Determines if bullets can affect the owner's allies.

isUseSharedHitList.Wiki: Determines how multiple projectiles from a single bullet behave when hitting the same target (needs info).

attachEffectType.Wiki: Determines if this bullet will deflect other bullets with specific fields.

isHitForceMagic.Wiki: Determines if this bullet will be deflected by other bullets with attachEffectType = 1.

isIgnoreMoveStateIfHitWater.Wiki: Determines if bullet will collide with water collision false = collide, true = do not collide

isHitDarkForceMagic.Wiki: Determines if this bullet will be deflected by other bullets with attachEffectType = 3.
